summary:
Replaces the default Bethesda intro with a sexier intro!

Fully supports 1920x1080 screen resolution!

Watch the video to see for yourself!
(Video in mod description, don't stare at this box and hope the video shows up. It won't.)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/18970-2-1339990608.png[/img][/center]

[center][color=red][size=5]THE LQ, HQ AND 'UHQ LOUD' VERSIONS OF THIS MOD ARE EXTREMELY LOUD![/size][size=5]
I HIGHLY RECCOMEND THE [/size][/color][color=green][size=5]UHQ[/size][/color][color=red][size=5] FILE, AS IT IS AT A NORMAL VOLUME![/size][/color][/center]

[youtube]Dw_VeQXar-s[/youtube] [youtube]RL0TGi5dz8U[/youtube]
[youtube]02VgnYz9YNQ[/youtube]

[center][color=orange]Howdy Nexus Community!
From the first moments I excitedly started up Skyrim to playing the heavily modded
game I have now, I've always had a distaste for the incessant
'Bethesda Logo' show when the game is booted up.[/color]

[color=red]About 30 minutes ago I decided to change that.[/color]
[size=0.5][color=red](As of the upload time!)[/color][/size]

[color=orange]So, I strode through the bowels of You-Tube to find the 'Live Action Skyrim' commercial, chopped it down with pinpoint precision, and consumed all of my magicka converting it in a '.bik' file. I searched for the correct folder, shoved it in with all my might, consuming all of my stamina in the process, and managed to facilitate this work onto the Nexus!

I hope you all enjoy! Thanks![/color]
[/center][center]_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=green]INSTALLATION[/color]
1. Manually download file
2. Open Skyrim Data folder; usually located at 'C:\STEAM\SteamApps\common\skyrim'
3. Rename the file in this folder to BGS_Logo_old
4. Extract the downloaded file with chosen extracting program to this location;
[color=red]C:\STEAM\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Video[/color]
5. Enjoy the sexier intro!

OR

1. Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]
2. Activate!
3. Enjoy the sexier intro and the simplicity of the Mod Manager!
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=green]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
1. Remove the file you added with this mod at this location;
[color=red]C:\STEAM\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Video[/color]
2. Rename the original file back to BGS_Logo

OR

1. Double-click the mod in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] to disable it, or click it once and then click the red 'X' button on the right, deleting the mod permanently.
_________________________________________________________________________________________
-Future Plans-
-Make a randomizer with many intro movies EVENTUALLY
_________________________________________________________________________________________
My Other Mods
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11153]Cwazy Skywim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12379]Profane Skyrim[/url][/center]
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Featured In:
[url=http://itcprosolutions.com/skyrimguides/modding_guide.htm]Skyrim Mod Guide[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=18970]A Japanese Site[/url]
author: BOBONATOR2

files.name: Better Skyrim Intro UHQ
files.changelogHtml:
Added a UHQ (Ultra High Quality) Version, fully supporting 1920x1080 Resolution
Turned down the sound to be much less heart attack inducing

files.name: Better Skyrim Intro UHQ LOUD
files.changelogHtml: Added a UHQ LOUD version, which is as VERY loud! Fully supports 1920x1080 screen resolution.
